scripts.swa: npm run build -w shared && swa start dev
scripts.build: npm -w shared run build && npm -w frontend -w frontend/api -w backend run build
scripts.typecheck: npm -w shared run build && npm -w frontend -w frontend/api -w backend run typecheck --if-present
scripts.clean: tsc -b --clean tsconfig.refs.json || true && rimraf **/dist && rimraf **/.cache && rimraf **/*.tsbuildinfo && rimraf coverage
scripts.test: npm run build:ts && npm run test -w shared --if-present && npm run test -w backend --if-present && npm run test -w frontend/api --if-present
scripts.coverage: npm run build:ts && c8 --reporter=text --reporter=lcov npm run test -w shared --if-present && c8 report
